FuncDef: The display evpn track-peer-timer command displays information about a timer for peer status tracking based on an ESI.

ParaDef.Info:
Displays an Ethernet segment identifier (ESI).
The value is in the format of xxxx.xxxx.xxxx.xxxx.xxxx, where x is a hexadecimal integer ranging from 0 to F. The value must start with 00 or 01 but cannot be all 0s.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To view information about a timer for peer status tracking based on an ESI on the master main control board, run the display evpn track-peer-timer esi command.
